# Draft:Ahmad Kaawar

----
Ahmad Hussein Kaawar (born 24 August 2000 in Blida, Lebanon) is a Lebanese professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Sagesse SC in the Lebanese Premier League.
Kaawar began his career in 2016 with Al Mabarra in the Lebanese Second Division, first playing in the youth team before joining the senior squad. His season with the first team was temporarily halted due to the COVID-19 pandemic. After the league resumed, he spent a full season with Mabarra before signing with Al Ahed FC. During his time with Ahed, he was loaned back to Mabarra and later to Akhaa Ahli Aley for one season.
Sagesse FC
In July 2023, Kaawar signed for Sagesse FC. He played 17 league games in his first season, contributing to five clean sheets that helped stabilize Sagesse’s position in the Premier League [https://www.aljoumhouria.com/ar/news/774742/%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%AD%D8%A7%D8%B1%D8%B3-%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%A7%D8%AE%D8%B6%D8%B1-%D8%A7%D9%84%D9%85%D9%88%D9%87%D9%88%D8%A8?utm_source=inarticle&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=listnews]. As of May 2025, he has 11 appearances in the current campaign. After that, he has been praised as “l’un des gardiens les plus prometteurs de la Première Ligue libanaise” (one of the most promising goalkeepers in the Lebanese Premier League) [https://www.facebook.com/share/r/1aTERJnW28/]
Career Statistics
Across his domestic career, Kaawar has made a total of 68 appearances:
* Lebanese First Division: 48 appearances, 0 goals, 2 yellow cards, 4,320 minutes played.
* Lebanese Second Division: 18 appearances, 0 goals, 3 yellow cards, 1,560 minutes played.
* Lebanese Cup: 1 appearance, 0 goals, 90 minutes played.
*  during 2022]]Lebanese Challenge Cup: 2 appearances, 0 goals, 180 minutes played.
* Lebanese Federation Cup: 1 appearance, 0 goals, 90 minutes played.
International Career
Kaawar started in 2018 training with the Lebanon national beach soccer team as the goalkeeper and participated with them in a friendly tournament in Dubai during summer 2022 and in 2023 Arab Beach Soccer Cup in Saudi Arabia during summer 2023 and in 2024 Euro Beach Soccer League in Georgia during summer 24 where the Lebanese team was a guest of honor
Style of play
Kaawar is known for his shot-stopping ability, particularly his quick reflexes and agility in goal. His athleticism and reaction speed are considered key aspects of his goalkeeping style.
